title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 92-1.10 - Equivalencies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 92-1.10 - Equivalencies

State Regulations

Equivalent training or course work shall be that training or course work which covers the concepts of disease transmission, scientifically accepted principles and practices for infection control, and engineering and work practice control as detailed in the syllabus. Equivalent course work or training must emphasize the bidirectional aspect of disease transmission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
92-1.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
